text: mesema sæma nabivarayatama minisungenda, jinvarungenda æti seyitanvarunva api saturan bavata pat kara tibunemu. ovungen samaharek samaharekuva ravatanu pinisa alamkaravat (boru) vadan (kanhi) rahasin pavasa (visuruva harimin) sitiyaha. obage deviyan adahas kara tibune nam, mese ovun kara tikhennata ida næta. ebævin (nabiye!) oba ovunvada, ovunge boru kiyamanda hæra damanu
